items.content_html: Lazy CSS is a lightweight, utility-first CSS framework that generates styles on-demand as you use them in your HTML or JSX. It offers a Tailwind-like experience but with a "lazy" approach, minimizing CSS overhead. Supports vanilla JS and React, with easy configuration and a wide range of pre-defined utilities and color palettes.
items.title: Bhargavxyz738/Lazy-CSS: Lazy CSS is a lightweight, utility-first CSS framework that generates styles on-demand as you use them in your HTML or JSX.  It offers a Tailwind-like experience but with a "lazy" approach, minimizing CSS overhead.  Supports vanilla JS and React, with easy configuration and a wide range of pre-defined utilities and color palettes.

items.content_html: PlayMyPodcast is a lightweight, serverless app that transforms your podcast RSS feed into a seamless, voice-controlled listening experience on Google Home. It fetches and parses your podcast feed, creating a playable playlist with support for standard media commands like play, pause, and skip.
items.title: JBerendes/PlayMyPodcast: PlayMyPodcast is a lightweight, serverless app that transforms your podcast RSS feed into a seamless, voice-controlled listening experience on Google Home. It fetches and parses your podcast feed, creating a playable playlist with support for standard media commands like play, pause, and skip.

items.content_html: Mini Mealie is a lightweight Chrome extension designed to enhance the experience of Mealie, an open-source recipe manager. With Mini Mealie, users can quickly import recipes from any website into their Mealie instance with a simple right-click.
